caption: The girl arrives at the front door holding a stack of letters, and a very peculiar person descends from the sky headfirst. This person has blue skin and long, slender limbs. After a conversation with the girl, this man returns to his room. The girl goes back downstairs, and unexpectedly, the man with long limbs jumps down from the rooftop. The girl, now wearing a hat, enters the basement. In the basement, there are several elegantly dressed ladies. She sits on the sofa in the living room. After conversing with Madame, she returns upstairs. In a foggy mist, she encounters a boy.
